name: Excessive failed logins
description: Detects repeated failed authentication attempts against home services.
remediation: Lock the affected account and reset the password if necessary.

name: Port scan detection
description: Detects potential port scanning from a single source on the home network.
remediation: Block the offending IP at the firewall and investigate the device.

name: Suspicious DNS domain
description: Detects suspicious DNS queries that may indicate tunneling.
remediation: Inspect the device for malware and block the domain if confirmed malicious.
